item.text: List of applicable Comorbid conditions in ICD-10
Are there any arthritis conditions recorded ?

valueCoding.display: No, not of Hispanic, Latino/a, or Spanish origin

valueCoding.code: Yes, another Hispanic, Latino, or Spanish origin
valueCoding.display: Yes, another Hispanic, Latino, or Spanish origin

item.text: Do you need or want an interpreter to communicate with a doctor or health care staff ?
Has lack of transportation kept the patient from medical appointments, meetings, work, or from getting things needed for daily living ?

valueCoding.code: Yes, it has kept the patient from medical appointments or from getting my medications
valueCoding.display: Yes, it has kept the patient from medical appointments or from getting my medications

valueCoding.code: Yes, it has kept the patient from non-medical meetings, appointments, work, or from getting things that I need
valueCoding.display: Yes, it has kept the patient from non-medical meetings, appointments, work, or from getting things that I need

item.text: Ability to hear (with hearing aid or hearing appliances if normally used)

valueCoding.display: Adequate - no difficulty in normal conversation,social interaction, listening to TV
Minimal difficulty - difficulty in some environments(e.g., when person speaks softly or setting is noisy)
Moderate difficulty - speaker has to increase volume and speak distinctly
Highly impaired - absence of useful hearing

item.text: Ability to see in adequate light (with glasses or other visual appliances)

valueCoding.display: Adequate - sees fine detail,such as regular print in newspapers/books
Impaired - sees large print, but not regular print in newspapers/books
Moderately impaired - limited vision; not able to see newspaper headlines but can identify objects
Highly impaired - object identification in question, but eyes appear to follow objects
Severely impaired - no vision or sees only light, colors or shapes; eyes do not appear to follow objects

item.text: How often do you need to have someone help you when you read instructions, pamphlets, or other written material from your doctor or pharmacy?
Expression of ideas and wants (consider both verbal and non-verbal expression and excluding language barriers)

valueCoding.display: Expresses complex messages without difficulty and with speech that is clear and easy to understand
Exhibits some difficulty with expressing needs and ideas (e.g., some words or finishing thoughts) or speech is not clear
Frequently exhibits difficulty with expressing needs and ideas
Rarely/Never expresses self or speech is very difficult to understand

item.text: Understanding verbal and non-verbal content (with hearing aid or device, if used, and excluding language barriers)

valueCoding.display: Understands: Clear comprehension without cues or repetitions
Usually understands: Understands most conversations, but misses some part/intent of message. Requires cues at times to understand
Sometimes understands: Understands only basic conversations or simple, direct phrases. Frequently requires cues to understand

item.text: Should Brief Interview for Mental Status be conducted?
Repetition of Three Words, Number of words repeated after first attempt

valueCoding.display: Missed by > 5 years or no answer
Missed by > 1 month or no answer

item.text: Able to report correct day of the week
Should the Staff Assessment for Mental Status be Conducted?
Check all that the patient was normally able to recall

valueCoding.code: That they are in a hospital/hospital unit
valueCoding.display: That they are in a hospital/hospital unit

valueCoding.code: None of the above were recalled
valueCoding.display: None of the above were recalled

item.text: Does patient exhibit any of these mental statuses?
Presence of symptoms. Check all that apply

valueCoding.code: Little interest or pleasure in doing things
valueCoding.display: Little interest or pleasure in doing things

valueCoding.code: Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
valueCoding.display: Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much

valueCoding.code: Feeling tired or having little energy
valueCoding.display: Feeling tired or having little energy

valueCoding.code: Feeling bad about yourself – or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down
valueCoding.display: Feeling bad about yourself – or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down

valueCoding.code: Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television
valueCoding.display: Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television

valueCoding.code: Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed. Or the opposite – being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual
valueCoding.display: Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed. Or the opposite – being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual

valueCoding.code: Thoughts that you would be better off dead, or of hurting yourself in some way
valueCoding.display: Thoughts that you would be better off dead, or of hurting yourself in some way

item.text: How often does the patient has to limit day-to-day activities because of pain?
Has the patient had two or more falls in the past year or any fall with injury in the past year?

Does this patient have one or more unhealed pressure ulcers/injuries?
